changeSet.author: leo (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `b`.`KEMID` AS `kemid`,`b`.`HLDG_IP_IND` AS `hldg_ip_ind`,(case when (`r`.`SEC_RPT_GRP` <> 'CSHEQ') then sum(`b`.`HLDG_MVAL`) else (case when (`b`.`HLDG_IP_IND` = 'I') then (`a`.`CRNT_INC_CSH` + sum(`b`.`HLDG_MVAL`)) else (`a`.`CRNT_PRIN_CSH` + sum(`b`.`HLDG_MVAL`)) end) end) AS `VAL_AT_MARKET`,`r`.`SEC_RPT_GRP` AS `SEC_RPT_GRP`,sum(`b`.`HLDG_ANNL_INC_EST`) AS `ANN_INC_EST`,sum(`b`.`HLDG_FY_REM_EST_INC`) AS `FY_REM_EST_INC`,sum(`b`.`HLDG_NEXT_FY_EST_INC`) AS `NEXT_FY_EST_INC` from ((((`tem`.`end_crnt_tax_lot_bal_t` `b` join `tem`.`end_sec_t` `s`) join `tem`.`end_cls_cd_t` `cl`) join `tem`.`end_sec_rpt_grp_t` `r`) join `tem`.`end_crnt_csh_t` `a`) where ((`s`.`SEC_ID` = `b`.`SEC_ID`) and (`s`.`SEC_CLS_CD` = `cl`.`SEC_CLS_CD`) and (`cl`.`SEC_RPT_GRP` = `r`.`SEC_RPT_GRP`) and (`a`.`KEMID` = `b`.`KEMID`)) group by `b`.`KEMID`,`r`.`SEC_RPT_GRP`,`b`.`HLDG_IP_IND`,`a`.`CRNT_INC_CSH`,`a`.`CRNT_PRIN_CSH`

changeSet.author: leo (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `a`.`KEMID` AS `kemid`,(`a`.`CRNT_INC_CSH` + sum((case when (`e`.`HLDG_IP_IND` = 'I') then `e`.`HLDG_MVAL` else 0.00 end))) AS `INC_AT_MARKET`,(`a`.`CRNT_PRIN_CSH` + sum((case when (`e`.`HLDG_IP_IND` = 'P') then `e`.`HLDG_MVAL` else 0.00 end))) AS `PRIN_AT_MARKET`,((`a`.`CRNT_PRIN_CSH` + `a`.`CRNT_INC_CSH`) + sum(`e`.`HLDG_MVAL`)) AS `TOTAL_MARKET_VAL`,sum(`e`.`HLDG_ANNL_INC_EST`) AS `ANN_EST_INC`,sum(`e`.`HLDG_FY_REM_EST_INC`) AS `FY_REM_EST_INC`,sum(`e`.`HLDG_NEXT_FY_EST_INC`) AS `NEXT_FY_EST_INC` from (`tem`.`end_crnt_csh_t` `a` join `tem`.`end_crnt_tax_lot_bal_t` `e`) where (`a`.`KEMID` = `e`.`KEMID`) group by `a`.`KEMID`,`a`.`CRNT_PRIN_CSH`,`a`.`CRNT_INC_CSH`

changeSet.createView: select `rsp`.`NMSPC_CD` AS `rsp_nmspc_cd`,`rsp`.`RSP_ID` AS `rsp_id`,`r`.`NMSPC_CD` AS `NMSPC_CD`,`r`.`ROLE_NM` AS `ROLE_NM`,`rr`.`ROLE_ID` AS `ROLE_ID`,`rm`.`MBR_ID` AS `MBR_ID`,`rm`.`MBR_TYP_CD` AS `MBR_TYP_CD`,`rm`.`ROLE_MBR_ID` AS `ROLE_MBR_ID`,`actn`.`ACTN_TYP_CD` AS `ACTN_TYP_CD`,`actn`.`ACTN_PLCY_CD` AS `ACTN_PLCY_CD`,`actn`.`FRC_ACTN` AS `FRC_ACTN`,`actn`.`PRIORITY_NBR` AS `PRIORITY_NBR` from (((((`tem`.`krim_rsp_t` `rsp` left join `tem`.`krim_rsp_tmpl_t` `rspt` on((`rsp`.`RSP_TMPL_ID` = `rspt`.`RSP_TMPL_ID`))) left join `tem`.`krim_role_rsp_t` `rr` on((`rr`.`RSP_ID` = `rsp`.`RSP_ID`))) left join `tem`.`krim_role_mbr_t` `rm` on((`rm`.`ROLE_ID` = `rr`.`ROLE_ID`))) left join `tem`.`krim_role_rsp_actn_t` `actn` on(((`actn`.`ROLE_RSP_ID` = `rr`.`ROLE_RSP_ID`) and ((`actn`.`ROLE_MBR_ID` = `rm`.`ROLE_MBR_ID`) or (`actn`.`ROLE_MBR_ID` = '*'))))) left join `tem`.`krim_role_t` `r` on((`rr`.`ROLE_ID` = `r`.`ROLE_ID`))) order by `rsp`.`NMSPC_CD`,`rsp`.`RSP_ID`,`rr`.`ROLE_ID`,`rm`.`ROLE_MBR_ID`

changeSet.createView: select `rspt`.`NMSPC_CD` AS `rsp_tmpl_nmspc_cd`,`rspt`.`NM` AS `rsp_tmpl_nm`,`rsp`.`NMSPC_CD` AS `rsp_nmspc_cd`,`rsp`.`NM` AS `rsp_nm`,`rsp`.`RSP_ID` AS `rsp_id`,`a`.`NM` AS `attr_nm`,`d`.`ATTR_VAL` AS `attr_val`,`r`.`NMSPC_CD` AS `NMSPC_CD`,`r`.`ROLE_NM` AS `ROLE_NM`,`rr`.`ROLE_ID` AS `ROLE_ID` from (((((`tem`.`krim_rsp_t` `rsp` left join `tem`.`krim_rsp_tmpl_t` `rspt` on((`rsp`.`RSP_TMPL_ID` = `rspt`.`RSP_TMPL_ID`))) left join `tem`.`krim_rsp_attr_data_t` `d` on((`rsp`.`RSP_ID` = `d`.`RSP_ID`))) left join `tem`.`krim_attr_defn_t` `a` on((`d`.`KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID` = `a`.`KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID`))) left join `tem`.`krim_role_rsp_t` `rr` on((`rr`.`RSP_ID` = `rsp`.`RSP_ID`))) left join `tem`.`krim_role_t` `r` on((`rr`.`ROLE_ID` = `r`.`ROLE_ID`))) order by `rspt`.`NMSPC_CD`,`rspt`.`NM`,`rsp`.`NMSPC_CD`,`rsp`.`NM`,`rsp`.`RSP_ID`,`a`.`NM`,`d`.`ATTR_VAL`

changeSet.author: leo (generated)
changeSet.createView: (select `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`FDOC_NBR` AS `fdoc_nbr`,sum((case `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`ITM_ACTV_IND` when 'Y' then (case `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`ITM_ORD_QTY` when NULL then `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`ITM_UNIT_PRC` else (`tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`ITM_ORD_QTY` * `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`ITM_UNIT_PRC`) end) when NULL then (case `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`ITM_ORD_QTY` when NULL then `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`ITM_UNIT_PRC` else (`tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`ITM_ORD_QTY` * `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`ITM_UNIT_PRC`) end) when 'N' then 0 else 0 end)) AS `TOTAL_AMOUNT` from `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t` group by `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t`.`FDOC_NBR`)

changeSet.author: leo (generated)
changeSet.createView: (select `a`.`FDOC_NBR` AS `fdoc_nbr`,sum(`a`.`ITM_OSTND_ENC_AMT`) AS `TOTAL_ENCUMBRANCE` from `tem`.`pur_po_itm_t` `a` group by `a`.`FDOC_NBR`)

changeSet.author: leo (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `p`.`AP_PUR_DOC_LNK_ID` AS `AP_PUR_DOC_LNK_ID`,`p`.`PO_ID` AS `PO_ID`,`p`.`PO_CUR_IND` AS `PO_CUR_IND`,`p`.`FDOC_NBR` AS `FDOC_NBR`,`p`.`OBJ_ID` AS `OBJ_ID`,`p`.`PO_STAT_CD` AS `PO_STAT_CD`,`p`.`RECUR_PMT_TYP_CD` AS `RECUR_PMT_TYP_CD`,`p`.`PO_VNDR_CHC_CD` AS `PO_VNDR_CHC_CD`,`p`.`PO_END_DT` AS `PO_END_DT`,`e`.`TOTAL_ENCUMBRANCE` AS `TOTAL_ENCUMBRANCE`,`summation`.`TOTAL_AMOUNT` AS `TOTAL_AMOUNT` from ((`tem`.`pur_po_t` `p` join `tem`.`pur_po_itm_tot_enc_v` `e`) join `tem`.`pur_po_itm_tot_amt_v` `summation`) where ((`p`.`FDOC_NBR` = `e`.`fdoc_nbr`) and (`p`.`FDOC_NBR` = `summation`.`fdoc_nbr`))
